html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-18732009-11-19,  ,  ,  ,  IA&ND
ActMackenzie Valley Resource Management Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Preliminary Screening Requirement Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PRELIMINARY SCREENING REQUIREMENT REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) to address technical issues raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations. The amendments ensure that the Preliminary Screening Requirement Regulations are up to date and that the provisions of other statutes and regulations that are listed in Schedules 1 and 2 of the Regulations fall within the authorities provided in the Mackenzie Valley Resource Management Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0306 Publication Date: 2009-12-09
AttachmentsAttachment

The amendments ensure that the Preliminary Screening Requirement Regulations are up to date and that the provisions of other statutes and regulations that are listed in Schedules 1 and 2 of the Regulations fall within the authorities provided in the Mackenzie Valley Resource Management Act.
